allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, re content = sys.stdin.read\(\) # Look for error-related strings in the Next.js data chunks chunks = re.findall\(r''self\\.__next_f\\.push\\\(\\[1,""\(.*?\)""\\]\\\)'', content\) for c in chunks[:5]: if ''error'' in c.lower\(\) or ''Error'' in c: print\(c[:500]\) ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys, re, json content = sys.stdin.read\(\) # Find all RSC data chunks chunks = re.findall\(r''self\\.__next_f\\.push\\\(\\[1,""\(.*?\)""\\]\\\)'', content\) all_data = '''' for c in chunks: all_data += c # Look for error indicators if ''NEXT_NOT_FOUND'' in all_data: print\(''NEXT_NOT_FOUND triggered''\) if ''error'' in all_data.lower\(\): # find context idx = all_data.lower\(\).find\(''error''\) print\(''Error context:'', all_data[max\(0,idx-50\):idx+200]\) ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys, re content = sys.stdin.read\(\) chunks = re.findall\(r''self\\.__next_f\\.push\\\(\\[1,""\(.*?\)""\\]\\\)'', content\) all_data = ''''.join\(chunks\) # Look for notFound, the error boundary data idx = all_data.find\(''notFou''\) if idx >= 0: print\(''notFound context:'', all_data[idx:idx+300]\) # look for the actual error idx2 = all_data.find\(''""error""''\) while idx2 >= 0 and idx2 < len\(all_data\): snippet = all_data[idx2:idx2+100] if ''undefined'' not in snippet: print\(''non-null error:'', snippet\) idx2 = all_data.find\(''""error""'', idx2+1\) if idx2 > 10000: break ")
